summary:
New set of weapons that burst into flames!
19 weapons pack!
descriptionHtml:
UPDATED! 2012/09/18

Hello again everyone!

Here I bring my last piece of work
The Amberstone Weapons!

I\'m talking about a NEW STAND ALONE set of weapons all based on the Glass type
There are: 

Arrows
Battleaxe
Bow
Dagger
GreatSword
Mace
Sword
War Axe
Warhammer


V3 added:
Mallet [Two Handed Hammer that will make your foes fly away with Knockback!]
Morning Star [Has high reach and swings faster]
Rapier [Fastest sword]
Scimitar [High reach]
Spear [Highest reach of all weapons]
Staves of Flames, Firebolt and Fireball both with 1000 charges

V4 added:
Katana [Swings faster]

V5 added:
Katar [Assassin themed weapon, swings really fast for deadly blows]
Scythe [Long reach Grim Reaper\'s weapon to behead everyone in your way]

New V6 adds:
Bastard Sword [Huge reach and Knockback, but slow]
Tachi [Waay longer Katana like weapon, really fast and huge reach]

Every weapon has CUSTOM TEXTURE, Silver and Red

Every weapon BURST INTO FLAMES

All weapons enchanted with 15 fire damage and some with fiery KNOCKBACK

All craftable under the Glass Section, but they need Amberstone Ingots and Silver to make.

Amberstone Ingots can be crafted with a Malachite Ore or Ingot and a Fire Salt under any smelter


Video by Brodual:
[youtube]aaXLBMZRnV8[/youtube]
http://www.youtube.com/user/Brodual

Thanks!

Download, Extract and Be Happy!
